resources.string: here will be your password...\n Just press GENERATE

Create strong passwords with keywords from your favorite movie to protect your accounts. \n\nHarry Potter is a series of seven fantasy novels written by British author J. K. Rowling. The novels chronicle the lives of a young wizard, Harry Potter student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The main story arc concerns Harrys struggle against Lord Voldemort, a dark wizard who intends to become immortal, overthrow the wizard governing body known as the Ministry of Magic and subjugate all wizards and Muggles.
